text: Kirby's Dream Land, called in Japan, is a platform video game made by HAL Laboratory, Inc. and published by Nintendo for the Game Boy. ==Plot== King Dedede steals all the food from Dream Land. Now, Kirby has to get it back from him. ==Other websites== * * ==References== Category:1992 video games D Category:HAL Laboratory games Category:Game Boy games Category:Platform games Category:Side-scrolling platform games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Virtual Console games
title: Kirby's Dream Land
